sections.label: Urban/Wastewater virome
sections.query: (virome OR "viral metagenomics") AND (wastewater OR sewage OR "built environment" OR urban)

sections.label: Metagenomics methods
sections.query: metagenomics AND (benchmark* OR pipeline OR "quality control" OR assembly OR classification)

items.title: Noncanonical genetic markers resolve the pre-GOE emergence of aerobic bacteria in Earth's history.
items.authors: Tianhua Liao, Shanshan Chen, Sishuo Wang, Yongjie Huang, Stephen Kwok Wing Tsui, Eva E Stüeken
items.journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
items.abstract_snippet: The transition from anaerobic to aerobic life was a pivotal adaptation in Earth's history, yet the timing and genomic drivers remain poorly resolved. Traditional approaches relying on oxygen-utilizing genes need improvement for obligate anaerobes and fragmenta…

sections.label: Influenza evolution
sections.query: (influenza OR flu) AND (evolution OR "positive selection" OR "antigenic drift" OR clade)

sections.label: H5N1 / avian influenza
sections.query: H5N1 OR "highly pathogenic avian influenza" OR HPAI
